title:
11c02 - Collection
agencies.
text:
Employees of
collection agencies or collection departments of credit bureaus engaged in the
collection and remittance of funds and negotiable instruments for transmittal
across State lines are engaged in interstate commerce, as are employees engaged
in the preparation of financial reports, statements, correspondence, or other
written material for transmittal across State lines.
html: Employees of collection agencies or collection departments of credit bureaus engaged in the collection and remittance of funds and negotiable instruments for transmittal across State lines are engaged in interstate commerce, as are employees engaged in the preparation of financial reports, statements, correspondence, or other written material for transmittal across State lines.
